amendment.description: Amendment sought to change the bill's permanent authorization of appropriations to an authorization for five years.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 110-677 to change the bill's permanent authorization of appropriations to an authorization for five years.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A001) and on the bill pursuant to the rule.
On agreeing to the Bishop (UT) amendment (A001) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 178 - 232 (Roll No. 384).
